steps.title: Execute the Tool
steps.details: Search executed without errors and returned 1 issue matching the JQL. The issue has priority 'High' and includes key, id, projectId, summary, description, assignee, priority, status, and url.

steps.details: Output starts with 'Found 1 Jira issues:'; returned issue has priority 'High' and includes key, summary, status, assignee, and browseable URL.

steps.title: Verify Result Limit
